documentation.subject: Pacemaker: ${metric.label.resource} is in status `Stopped` on ${metric.label.node}

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
fetch gce_instance
| metric 'workload.googleapis.com/sap/cluster/failcounts'
# Uncomment and modify the following line to filter by SID
#| filter (metric.sid =~ 'SID')
| group_by [metric.node, metric.resource, metric.sid], [min(val())]
| window 3m
| condition gt(val(), 999999)
